descript.purpose:
This dataset was acquired from the Medina CAD's vendor BIS Consulting for distribution in the TNRIS DataHub as part of the annually updated statewide land parcel program. Visit the website for current details, program progress, and FAQs https://tnris.org/stratmap/land-parcels/
TNRIS compiled existing parcel data and transformed it into a common schema via translation tools for ease of use statewide. When applicable, some fields were concatenated or calculated. Null or empty values denote absence of data in the provided request. Geometry was not edited nor will be in the future by TNRIS. Please contact the CAD or their vendor for more information that is outside of the scope of this dataset or program.
The enclosed csv/xml file documents data mappings used in the conversion from the source data into the common schema. This denotes the source field names that were translated into the common schema fields.
Field descriptions are taken from industry standards and supplemented by TNRIS.

idinfo.useconst: TNRIS takes no responsibility for the spatial accuracy, completeness, or currency of the data. The dataset may not be survey grade and should not be utilized as such.

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Source unique identifier that can be joined with other datasets
Source unique identifier that can be joined with other datasets
Owner of the parcel
Owner of the parcel
Legal area per deed. The non-rounded value.
Legal area units per deed.
The area calculated within GIS
The area calculated units within GIS
Legal description from deed
Current value of land
Current value of improvements
Current market value
The main address of this property. Data concatenated into one field
The house number of the main property
The street directional or unit of the main property
The street name of the main property
The street name info of the main property
The city of the main property
The state of the main property
The zip of the main property
The mailing address for the owner of the property. Data concatenated into one field
The mailing street, directional and unit
Additional mailing info
The mailing city
The mailing state
The mailing zip code
The source of this data. For example, appraisal district or name of vendor
The date TNRIS acquired this data.
County jurisdiction 5 digit FIPS code
County name
The year of this dataset
Year structure built
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
